product_overview: UPStartin is a comprehensive SaaS platform designed to unify fragmented digital tools used by content creators, digital agencies, and freelancers into a single professional ecosystem. It consolidates project management, CRM, financial tracking, contract handling, and marketing into an integrated solution that improves operational efficiency and client transparency.
core_goals: Enhance operational efficiency by reducing tool-switching and manual coordination.
Increase transparency and trust through a client portal displaying real-time project status.
Improve financial management with categorized tracking, recurring billing, and document attachments.
Convert social media organic traffic into verified leads via a customizable link-in-bio profile.
Ensure high availability and secure user authentication with modern cloud infrastructure.
key_features: Dashboard providing monthly financial summaries, urgent task alerts, and upcoming appointments.
Kanban-style project management with dynamic columns and task assignments.
Comprehensive CRM with client profiles, interaction history, and secure portal tokens.
Financial center for managing revenues, expenses, fixed and variable costs, with attachment support.
Contract management including upload, status tracking, and payment linkage.
Sales and inventory management with stock control and reports.
UPStartin Bio for creating and customizing public profiles with lead capture forms.
Secure authentication backed by Supabase Auth and session management.
Responsive UI adaptable to mobile, tablet, and desktop formats.
user_flow_summary: User onboarding includes registration, bio profile setup, and client addition.
Sales cycle from lead capture via bio profile, client conversion, project and contract management, to payment recording.
Post-sale client interactions through the portal for monitoring project progress and accessing invoices.
validation_criteria: Dashboard loads within 2 seconds with accurate financial and task data.
Authentication flow tested for security and session management robustness.
Kanban tasks support creation, assignment, tagging, and status transitions as designed.
Financial entries support categorization, attachment uploads, and accurate reporting.
Contracts are uploaded, status-tracked, and linked correctly to financial payments.
Client portal securely provides up-to-date project and billing information.
Responsive design verified across devices with consistent user experience.
Lead capture forms successfully create CRM prospects and notify users.
